segments.text: I'm sorry , ladies . Mr . Smith's viewing is over . It ended an hour ago .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But we just drove across town . Can't we just go in to see him one last ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm afraid not . But at tomorrow's funeral , the family requested an open casket service .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This is all too fast . He's my best friend , and now he's gone .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry . I know it must have come as a great shock .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The viewing was for saying goodbye , and I didn't even get that .
segments.speaker: S2
